goals__remit:
AI Labs is an AI R&D and Accellerator involving the best AI talents in Europe in Research and Development related to Machine Learning and AI into 3 main areas: Life, Transport and Education.  
The Lab funded in 2018 is hiring 20 PHD and building the team.
